name: When We Fall Asleep
description:
Project Started: November 7th of 2019

This is my first 'actual' game that I've made. This is actually a school project, but I wanted to see if this could actually be something more than just a school project. I'd love to get some actual feedback and I'd like to know how you think the game should go forward, any fixes or add-ons that would make the game better. 

I have a lot of ideas for this game, I'll just need to figure out how to execute those ideas. 

I try to update bugs and some fixes every week.

The full game is estimated to release early 2020 and the pricing will probably be around 5$.

HEY!

Would you be interested in testing the game and filling a short form while testing the game. Testers of all kind needed. Testers that give feedback get the full game for free when it's finished.

P.S. sorry about not having any controller tutorial, I'll try and fix one real quick.

P.P.S. I'll be making a full asset list whit the full game release, but if you like to know about some assets, i can link the to you.
